pages.text: $(item)Power Cells$() are a simple low-tier energy source, perfectly suited for those inexperienced with electricity.$(br)They connect automatically to the next energy-accepting block, as long as they don't require too much energy.
Being assembled by and bought from $(italics)someone more experienced$(), these cells are usually pre-filled.$(br)Their current fuel status may be queried in the form of a simple blue bar.
$(br)In case of longer term usage, they can be re-filled with $(item)Chemical Fuel$().$(br)Chemical Fuel fills a Power Cell by twenty-five percent.
Power Cells are refilled manually, or with $(item)Dispensers$().$(br)For the sake of convenience, they also output a comparator-signal depending on how much energy is left.
